edition: Hymni Homerici, creator; Hesiod, creator; Homer, creator; Evelyn-White, Hugh G. (Hugh Gerard), d. 1924, translator

text.0:
Of Pallas Athena, guardian of the city, I begin to sing. Dread is she, and with Ares
 she loves deeds of war, the sack of cities and the shouting and the battle. It is she who
 saves the people as they go out to war and come back.
text.1: Hail, goddess, and give us good fortune with happiness!

author: homeric hymns
